body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/6jsLK7cOkDZZ5nYSXza-EZ7w8Y-l4r0eUEfnODln2MKnQp787KPmR1gdWzOxRjgLLqwq0QHUqb-MwD653vnty-oMhXuVDBsW/Screenshot.jpg) Hi everyone, I have been having trouble analysing the radiation of this model: For some reason I am getting a strange response as to why I can't get it to work. It says it needs a Bounding Box but I have no idea how to fix it. I used a pretty standard script to try make this work: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CRijpnqjb_k](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CRijpnqjb_k) Appreciate any ideas!
